mapper.sql:
FROM eatja.infrMember a left join eatja.infrMemberPhone as c on c.infrMember_Seq = a.seq and c.ifmpDelNy = 0 WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifmmDelNy = 1 AND a.ifmmDelNy = 0
AND ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmName},'%')
AND a.ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.ifmmBirthday BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}
mapper.select: SELECT seq , ifmmName FROM infrMember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmDelNy = 0
SELECT a.seq ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmPassword ,a.ifmmBirthday ,a.regDateTime ,a.modDateTime ,a.ifmmRecommendSeq ,a.ifmmDelNy FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 and ifmmDelNy = 0 and seq = #{seq}
